document.full_text: prosecutors finished their closing argument in the perjury trial of former baseball player barry bonds by painting him as a slippery superstar who lied to hide his use of performance-enhancing drugs while he closed in on the game's all-time home run record.
document.title: prosecutors: barry bonds lied to protect reputation
